name: On The Other Side (itch)
description:
A game about literally switching sides! Made to fit the theme "Playing Both Sides" for Content Creators Community Jam 2020 or CCC Jam 2020. 

The game is quite short but there are easter eggs scattered all around the levels! And oh! Comment down below if you answered yes or no to the joke.

All the assets and code were done by me! Music was made in Bosca Ceoil. Art was made in Krita. Game was developed in Godot. Thanks for playing!
